resources.string:
"Hi, I am Charl. An Educator with nearly 2 decades of experience in Education, Training, and Development. I love developing talent and helping people succeed.
Some of my most recent projects included, working with the Ministry of Education in Thailand to train more than 300 Adult Educators in a variety of instructional design methodologies, as well as providing training in Language Acquisition methodologies to more than 500 Teachers in the formal education sector. I have also successfully designed and delivered workshops on a variety of topics ranging from Instructional design to Coaching in both Malaysia and Indonesia.
Recently I have taken an interest in Technology and have started developing my programming skills. I'd love to combine my newfound interest in Tech with my long-standing passion for Education, Training, and Development in order to provide innovative training solutions to both private and public institutions."
